summary: SummaryEMBRYOLISSE Lait-Crème Concentré is the ideal moisturizer for face and body, for all skin types, even the most sensitive. Effective formula with shea butter, beeswax, soy proteins and aloe vera. Multipurpose care, it can be used as makeup base, mask and makeup remover, after-sun and aftershave care.
details: DetailsBenefitsMoisturizingNourishingFirmingSmoothingMulti-purpose skincareIdeal make-up baseSuitable for sensitive skinUsed by professional makeup artistsRecommended by dermatologistsFeaturesAll skin typesNon-comedogenicSweet floral scentRecyclable aluminum tube and packagingMade in FranceKey IngredientsShea butter: nourishing and softeningBeeswax: protectiveAloe vera: moisturizing and soothingSoy proteins: moisturizingItem 2645088How To UseAs a moisturizing cream or make-up base, spread a small dab onto thoroughly cleansed and dry skin. Apply a more generous amount for use as cleansing and make-up removal lotion. As a mask, apply a thick layer to skin 1 to 2 times a week and leave on for 10 to 15 minutes.IngredientsAqua (Water), Paraffinum Liquidum, Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Glyceryl Stearate Se, Triethanolamine, Cera Alba (Beeswax), Cetyl Palmitate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, 1,2 Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Steareth-10, Polyacrylamide, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Parfum (Fragrance), Laureth-7, Propylene Glycol, Tropolone, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: As a moisturizing cream or make-up base, spread a small dab onto thoroughly cleansed and dry skin. Apply a more generous amount for use as cleansing and make-up removal lotion. As a mask, apply a thick layer to skin 1 to 2 times a week and leave on for 10 to 15 minutes.

reviews.headline: Yay!
reviews.comments: Love this moisturizer. It is great on my sensitive breakout prone skin. Lovely under makeup and just overall a great moisturizer.

reviews.headline: Best Moisturiser ever
reviews.comments: So happy that Ulta has this now. I have noticed a lot make up artist use this and always wanted to try. After I found it on ulta I ordered in no minutes. I use this as a mosutriser daily. I can see a healthy glow on my skin that last all day. I have tried so many mosturisers (drugstore and high end). Nothing gave result like this one. I highly recommend it to people with dry skin.

reviews.headline: glad this is now at Ulta!
reviews.comments: oooh it's good to see this is now at Ulta! I've been using this moisturizer for about a decade. it's so pleasant to use, very silky. makes your skin look and feel nourished without looking too shiny. it's my go-to primer before makeup, makes makeup apply smoothly and moisturizes any dry spots so I just glow.
